account.

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Freezable Token
@dev Token that can be freezed for chosen token holder.
attributes.name: FreezableToken

attributes.documentation:
@dev Owner can freeze the token balance for chosen token holder.
@param _wallet The address of token holder whose tokens to be frozen.
attributes.name: freezeAccount

attributes.documentation:
@dev Owner can unfreeze the token balance for chosen token holder.
@param _wallet The address of token holder whose tokens to be unfrozen.
attributes.name: unfreezeAccount

attributes.documentation:
@dev Check the specified token holder whether his/her token balance is frozen.
@param _wallet The address of token holder to check.
attributes.name: isFrozen

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
